knit.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to make clothing out of wool, using two knitting needles

knit.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to use a plain (=basic) knitting stitch

knit.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: Harold is part of a tightly knit team.
